name: Silk Sonic Intro
content: 一 二 三 四
Who y'all came to see tonight
为谁而来 得要让女士们感觉良好
We gon' lock this groove in tight
Yeah huh well lock it in then
别要白白浪费此刻音乐
And make some noise for our host
Give it up for Bootsy Collins
It is I blaster of the universe
伙计希望你们享受其中
For a band that I name Silk Sonic
我团队的名字就是Silk Sonic
